name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Commode
description: Family has a elderly aunt who recently got into a car accident and requires a commode for toileting urgently. She was previously the sole breadwinner and the family is unable to afford a new commode. Preferably foldable/collapsible as the flat toilet is small.

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: Rollator
description: 70years old lady has limited mobility, she has to use wheelchair for long distances, she wants to have a rollator to practice walking so that she is able to walk more stably and be able to sit when she needs to rest.

name: Wheelchair
description: 65 years old Chinese female married and staying with her husband and daughter. Client is mostly homebound and is alone at home during the day, she experiences breathlessness whenever she ambulates in the Community. A wheelchair will help her to move around in the community.

name: TENA Pants M (Diapers)
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient. Patient requires the use of diapers on a long-term basis, and he uses around 3 – 5 pieces daily. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment.
The item can be found here: https://shopee.sg/-LOWEST-PRICE-GUARENTEED-TENA-PANTS-PLUS-M-L-XL-ADULT-DIAPERS-CARTON-SALES-i.45348627.956049420 (Shopee)
Kindly arrange for the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Adult Diaper
description: Client previously working as a cleaner has quit her job to care for her sick mother (stroke and dementia) after the helper left. Her husband working as a Grab driver, has incurred multiple traffic fines which lead to a huge sum as a penalty that his older daughter has to pay from her own life savings. The family has gotten the pain of losing so much money and they are now struggling to make ends meet. The family has only two working adults, lost one income as well as needing to provide for sick mother and client's youngest daughter (who is studying polytechnic this year). Accepting multiple donations from different donors. Please do email me as there are days where i will not be in office. Thank you!

name: Blood Glucose Meter
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to afford a blood sugar measuring meter to monitor her blood sugar level

name: Lifree Diapers (XL)
description:
Client struggling with medical issues that cause her to dependent on diapers. Due to lack of funds, she is unable to get the correct quantity of diapers - hence limiting her mobility.
She lives with her husband, who also has medical issues and cannot work, living in a rental unit with financial assistance. Looking for donations of XL size Lifree Pull up diapers to assist family.

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Clementi
contact.name: Gwen Ho

name: Freezer
description: Client is from a low-income family. recently husband's, who is sole breadwinner, his employment situation has not been very stable. She is looking for a freezer to store her frozen goods in however is unable to afford a new one. It would be helpful if they are able to receive one! Thank you :)

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Microwave
description: Low income family with two very young children, trying to make ends meet during the covid-19 season needs a microwave. Please respond if you are keen to donate. Note: Deliver directly to the beneficiary. Thank you.

name: Gas stove (gas cylinder type)
description: Family has a 60yo uncle who suffered a stroke recently and his wife, who is his full-time caregiver. They require a gas stove with 2 burners (using gas cylinder), as their existing one has spoilt. It will make it much easier and faster for her to prepare food for her husband. She is working night shifts to earn some income, but does not earn enough to afford a new one.

name: Air-Cooler
description: Ct is a single mother with 2 teenage sons staying in a 1-room rental flat. Ct is working part-time. Ct requests for an air-cooler for the family. Please contact Ms Tan Limin at 63260308 if you require further clarifications. Thank you!

name: Microwave Oven
description: Single father of a 12 year old would like to have a brand new microwave oven to be able to heat up the meals. Family has been financially stretched as father is unemployed.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Serene Koh

name: 20”/ 24” SMART TV
description: Request made for client’s father who is also diagnosed with cancer and on treatment. There are very limited things he can engage with and their current TV is not able to access local channels. With a new TV, it can aid his coping with treatment-related stresses

name: Smart TV
description: Television for elderly who stayed in a rental unit.

name: Daikin mc30vvm-h air purifier (or similar)
description: Client is diagnosed with multiple myeloma and is on treatment. She's advised that her space has to be clean and clutter free as she is going for her bone marrow transplant soon. Thus, having an air purifier will help her in keeping her environment clean. However, as she's financially needy, she is unable to afford it.

name: Hot & Cold Water Dispenser
description:
Client is a household of 6 family members. 
The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance.
The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. 
Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford the purchase a hot water dispenser.
Thank you

name: Air cooler
description: Elderly grandmother who is medically unfit for work and has 1 school-going son is hoping to get an air cooler, which would be helpful given her medical conditions. There is no income-earner in the family as her son is schooling in ITE full-time.

name: Microwave (Halal)
description: Client is a 33 year old who is the sole breadwinner for family members(wife and 4 small children aged 5 years old, 3 years old(twins) and a newborn). Client is earning low income and experiencing financial difficulties due multiple debts and the need to shift to a BTO. Currently, client is living in a rental flat. Client's wife is unable to work due to caregiving demands for a newborn baby. Client's current microwave has spoilt and does not have the means to replace a new set for the family. Halal microwave required.

name: Hot & Cold Water Dispenser
description:
Client is a household of 6 family members. 
The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance.
The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. 
Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford the purchase a hot & cold water dispenser.

name: vertical steamer
description: Client is from a low-income family with 4 children. The family is facing financial strains as the wife lost her job due to coivd-19 and the husband has recently job transition to a lower-paying job. They are looking for a vertical iron/steamer however they are unable to afford it. It would be helpful for the family to receive one. Thank you!

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Iron and Ironing Board
description: Client is a single-mother of a school-going child. She is presently awaiting confirmation for her full-time employment. Family requires an iron and ironing board as their current one is faulty.

name: microwave (halal - previous owner must be muslim)
description: Client's husband is a stroke patient and client is an elderly low income worker.

name: Metal Cabinet (Office/storage kind)
description: Family of 4 has significant financial difficulties with 1 school-going children and 1 elderly. House is infested with bed bugs and family would like to get a metal cabinet so that they can reduce the bed-bug infestations.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Ong Jing Quan

name: TV Console
description: A single-mother with a young child and facing financial difficulty needs a TV console to place the TV on. Otherwise, the TV will be placed on the floor.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Woodlands
contact.name: Ho Mee Chan

name: Bunk Bed Frame
description: Family of 7 stays in a 1 room rental flat. Family requires a double-decked bed frame (queen-size at the bottom; queen-size at the top OR queen-size at the bottom; single-size at the top) due to space constraints.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Hannah Lim

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: A single parent with a school going child requires a kitchen cabinet with a countertop as her existing one is quite worn out. A kitchen cabinet would help the family to be able to keep their pots and pans in a proper place as family resides in a rental flat with limited space.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Chua Bee Guet

name: Cupboard
description: My client needs a cupboard to hang his clothes. He has not been working for more than 20 years due to his health. He lives in a rental flat

name: Kitchen Rack
description: Client is 60plus who is staying alone in a rental flat. Client has to throw away her kitchen rack which was infested by bugs. Client prefers to cook for herself than buying outside food.

name: Kitchen Rack
description: Client is a single mother of 3 young children age between 3 to 8 years old. Client and her children had suffered a period of homelessness and have not have a stable housing for the past 8 years. In late September, HDB has allocated them a rental unit. As this is client’s first home, she does not have the necessities and furniture for her house. Unfortunately, she had also left her job as a cleaner recently as she had to look after her children when they fall ill often. Client is dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office and she is also looking for a suitable employment now.

name: Wardrobe (3door)
description: Client is divorced with one child young child 12 years old. She just gotten her rental flat recently and would appreciate some donations to help her furnish her flat’s basic necessities. Thank you so much.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Simranjit Kaur

name: Sliding door wardrobe
description:
Low-income single parent family with 2 school-going children is looking for a replacement of their current donated wardrobe which is faulty. Sliding door preferred due to limitation in space as family stays in a rental flat.

Max: 90 × 50 × 192cm

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother with 2 young children and she requires a laptop for her children's schoolwork. Client is low income and unable to afford laptop. Kindly contact 83226427 should you wish to donate. Thank you!

name: 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants
description:
Client works part time as a school canteen staff and has multiple dependents at home. She has difficulty meeting the diaper needs of elderly mother and 2 young nephews (2 & 4 years old). 

She requires 3 packets of TENA M size (pull up pants), 3 packets of huggies/drypers XL(pull up pants), and 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants. 

Please respond via email or whatsapp @ 66901010

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Wardrobe (prefer big one as it's a big family of 6)
description:
Family (include 3 school going children) home is having pest infestation and hoarding issue. The pest infestation and mold issue had affected most furniture at home where furniture needs to be replaced. Family does not have financial means to purchase as there is only one breadwinner at home where finances are tight. 

Please respond via email or whatsapp @66901010.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula (2-3 bottles)
description:
Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client's income was recently further impacted due to severe eczema experienced that led him to be hospitalized, affecting his ability to maintain employment. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapers. We would like to seek donations for 4 Drypers/Huggies diapers of size XL and 2 Drypers/Huggies diapers of XXL for the two sons in addressing their sanitary needs and Pediasure Milk Formula and Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula for children's development consumption due to family's financial struggles. Your kindness is much appreciated.

Please contact via email or whatsapp @66901010

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Pediasure Milk Formula (2-3bottles)
description: Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client's income was recently further impacted due to severe eczema experienced that led him to be hospitalized, affecting his ability to maintain employment. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapers. Your kindness is much appreciated.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Food Rations
description: A single male in his mid-40s struggling to secure stable employment and housing due to multiple health issues. He is struggling to fulfil 3 meals a day and would benefit from ready food rations.

name: Reusable bags
description:
Our centre is preparing to pack and distribute hampers in December. 
We'll require reusable bags (preferably medium to large size) to store the items. 

We're accepting second hand reusable bags that are in good condition.

name: balloons
description: We are looking for donation of cartoon balloons and helium to help cheer children in the hospital.

name: Toilet Training Seat
description: Ct is a single father who has a 4+ year old son. Ct is working part-time. Ct's son is not toilet trained yet, he avoids using the toilet as he is afraid of falling into the toilet bowl. Ct requests for a toilet training seat as it would reduce his son's fears greatly. Please contact Ms Tan Limin at 63260308 if you require further clarifications. Thank you!

name: Milk Powder (Similac Stage 3)
description: Family of 7, couple with 5 children requires short-term milk powder support. Father is the sole breadwinner and has not been working for the past one week as he was feeling unwell after vaccination. He works as a grab food delivery staff which affect the family financial situation. Wife is not working as she need to take care of the children at home.

name: Groceries
description:
Family with three children are facing financial difficulties and staying in a backpackers inn. They would require some groceries: Eggs, cheese, paratha, marigold milk, mineral water, F&N mango and apple juice. 

They would also need some stationery items for their children: Pencils, Markers, Mild liners, English notebook, artbook, sharpeners, paint brushes and paint (pastel colours).

name: Food Ration
description:
Elderly woman with unemployed daughter due to health issues require Vegetarian food rations.
Family do not take Garlic, Onion and Ginger.

1. Basmati Rice 5 Kg
2. Carrot x 1
3. Potato x 1 
4. Beetroot x 1 
5. Turmeric powder x 1 big packet
6. Salt x Big packet
7. Black Pepper
8. White Pepper
9. Garam Masala Big packet
10. Milo 3 in 1 x 1 packet
11. Nestum 3 in 1 x 1 packet
12. Dishwashing liquid x 1 big 
13. Laundry detergent powder x 1 Big
14. Mushroom can
15. Dettol / any antiseptic liquid - Big
16. Floor cleaner
17. Toilet Cleaner
18. Toilet Bowl cleaner
19. Kitchen Surface cleaner
20. Cleaning towels
21. Tomatoes
22. Tofu
21. Broccoli
22. Cauliflower

name: eBike
description: A family with a toddler staying in their rental flat. Father is working as a delivery rider and his income fluctuates according to the availability of orders. They are tapping on financial support in order to make their ends meet. Father’s electric bicycle is not working and he requires one which is LTA approved to continue support the family. A second-hand one is perfect!

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: Digital Camera
description: We are planning to conduct second run of photography group work. This run we are targetting at socially isolated and male seniors. We hope to tap on modality of photography as a platform to encourage participants to step out of their home, alleviate their anxieties and improve their quality of life. We would require 8 to 10 digital cameras (with charger)in mint condition. Please contact me at 96546514. Thank you.

name: Motorised scooter
description: An elderly client is requesting for a motorized scooter as his previous motorized scooter has broken down for a while and he is unable to walk with a steady gait after inserting 10 screws in his back and leg when he fell from the 2nd floor in 1989 when he was working as an aircon electrician. He is permanently unfit for work and requires a motorized scooter to allow him to travel further in place of his wheelchair as he feels very trapped and isolated in his rental unit.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Children's safety fence
description: Family has 3 young children and limited caregiving support. Family would require children's safety fence to ensure children will be safe at home and can be occupied in the play area. Appreciate donor to bear delivery cost! Fence/barrier such as: https://www.pupsikstudio.com/media/catalog/product/cache/44bd3fdaa27de03cf1d4d857832e2b29/7/1/710ccihgn2l._sl1500__1.jpg

name: MamyPoko Pants Extra Dry for boys & girls | Size XXL
description:
Urgent Needs! 
Family of 7 with five children lives in a 3-rm flat. Father recently left his job due to high stress which impacted his home life. The family recently welcomed their 5th child. With father's reduced income and an increase in expenses, we would like to seek support for the family to meet the basic needs of the children as parents gain stability in their income. Aid for this family has been split between 4 posts.

name: Milk and Diapers (M and XL size)
description: Family of 6, 3 young children and 1 baby (7, 4, 3 and 6 months). Both parents are working but generate low income and are facing financial difficulties. Family is looking for - Dulac stage 2 milk (2 tins), - M size and XL size diaper; any brand, any type (4 packs each). Appreciate for delivery to be arranged and covered by donor. Thank you!

name: Nature 1 (3 to 6) Tin Milk Powder
description: Family has three young children aged 3, 8 and 9 respectively. Family is facing financial difficulty as husband who is the sole breadwinner is diagnosed with Diabetes and recently his health has been deteriorating. He has not been able to go to work regularly due to his poor health. Family need assistance in buying milk powder. Youngest child is drinking Nature 1 (3 to 6) tin milk powder.

name: XL Huggies diapers pants
description: Family has 4 young children with the youngest just turned 1. Family is facing financial difficulties. Mother is unable to work currently due to her health. Father is the sole breadwinner with low income. Family requires assistance in buying diapers for their youngest child. Baby is wearing Size XL Huggies diapers pants.

name: Friso Gold Stage 3 Milk Powder
description: Family has 4 young children with the youngest is 1 years old. Family is facing financial difficulties as mother is unable to work currently due to her health. Father is the sole breadwinner earning low income. Family requires assistance in buying milk powder for their 1 year old. He is drinking Friso Gold Stage 3

name: Drypers Size XL
description: Family has three young children aged 3, 8 and 9 respectively. Family is facing financial difficulty as husband who is the sole breadwinner is diagnosed with Diabetes and recently his health has been deteriorating. He has not been able to go to work regularly due to the poor health. Family need assistance in buying diapers. Youngest child is wearing diapers brand Drypers Size XL.

name: XXL Drypers Drypantz Diapers
description: Family has two young children aged 1 and 4 years old. Family is facing financial difficulty as husband is the sole breadwinner and recently experienced a pay cut. Family need assistance in buying diapers. Child is wearing Size XXL Drypers Drypantz Diapers.

name: Children Supplies and Toiletries for Young Family with 3yo child
description: A young family requires assistance for children supplies (e.g Baby Bath Wash, Baby Wipes, Cereal) and Toiletries (e.g. Tissue Roll, Detergent Powder). Mother is currently heavily pregnant, while father is the sole breadwinner with minimal income. List of required is available, and amounts to approximately $75 - $80. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much

name: MamyPoko Pants Diapers (Medium, 3 packs)
description: Single mother with young child undergoing divorce from her abusive husband. Low-income due to irregular employment and was previously financially-dependent on husband.

name: Diaper - Drypers tape XXL
description: Client is a mother, functioning as sole caregiver for her 2 toddler children. Client is unemployed due to unforeseen circumstances and solely relying on financial assistance for family household expenses. Would appreciate if donor can sponsor diapers for her toddler children.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: milk powder
description: Client is living with her daughter, age 4 and her parents in a 3 room flat. Client's step-father is the sole breadwinner of the family, while client's mum is seeking employment. Client is not able to work at the moment as she has to bring her daughter, who may be on the autism spectrum for her appointments and therapies. Client is requesting for help for her daughter's milk powder

name: Milk and Diapers
description:
Family of 5, 3 young children (3, 2, 1). Parents are both working long hours but are lower income. Support for children’s daily necessities is appreciated.
- Nature one dairy premium milk; toddler (3 tins). - Drypers pants L (2 packs) & XL (4 packs). Appreciate for delivery to be arranged and covered by donor. Thank you!

name: Nestle Lactogen 3
description: Family of 5 with 2 schooling children and 1 baby. Father on dialysis past 7 years, unable to earn much, resulting in debts. Mother trying to make ends meet. Having a milk powder supply would greatly alleviate the family's stress.

name: Drypers XL
description: Family of 5 with 2 schooling children and 1 baby. Father on dialysis past 7 years, unable to earn much, resulting in debts. Mother trying to make ends meet. Having a diaper supply would greatly alleviate the family's stress.

Looking for:
1.The Nan Optipro 4 
2.Mamil Gold Soy
3.S26 Progress Stage 3

Low income family looking for different milk powder for the family of 3 children. The two older boys (4 years old and 3 years old) have been diagnosed with thalassemia. The younger sister (23 months) has special needs. 

The older boy is not eating well. He is supplementing his diet with NAN OptiPro. The second child is eating better but he is not able to take cow's milk and he is on Mamil Gold Soy Milk. The youngest child has not been gaining weight, so she is on S26.

name: Double Pram
description: Family has 3 young children. They are also currently looking after one auntie and mother. Family requires support for dryper brand diapers, milk powders for their 3 children and adult diapers for their auntie.

name: Baby Gate
description: Please contact Social Worker Elizabeth at 8588 6196 during office hours or email to Elizabeth.Chia@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Client is living in a 1-rm flat with her 2 young children and there is no door to the kitchen. Out of safety concern of her children entering the kitchen and being able to touch the low stove, she used a table as a makeshift baby gate. However, her son ran into the corner of the table and resulted in a deep cut and being hospitalized. Client is urgently requesting for a baby gate to prevent future accidents to the children.
